text: Juan Carlos Castillo (19 August 1964 - 25 November 1993) was a Colombian racing cyclist. He rode in two editions of the Tour de France. He was shot dead in his car in Colombia. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1964 births Category:1993 deaths Category:Colombian male cyclists Category:People from Manizales Category:Tour de France cyclists Category:Deaths by firearm in Colombia Category:Male murder victims Category:Murdered sportspeople Category:People murdered in Colombia
title: Juan Carlos Castillo
